MICRO
m00 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0001 00 0111010111 c//Bootstrap
m01 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//Bootstrap

m02 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR LOAD R,$K(R)
m03 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0101 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->X(R)
m04 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR(K)
m05 00000 000 000 111    000    001    0000 0000 00 0111011101 c//MDR+0->MAR(K)
m06 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m07 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0000 00 0010011101 c//MDR+0->FEEDBACKREGISTER, RAMF
m08 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m0a 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR STORE R,$K(R)
m0b 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0101 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->X(R)
m0c 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR(K)
m0d 00000 000 000 111    000    001    0000 0000 00 0111011101 c//MDR+0->MAR(K)
m0e 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m0f 00000 000 000 011    000    001    0000 0000 00 0000011111 c//FEEDBACKREGISTER+0->NOP,MWE~
m10 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m11 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m12 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR ADD R,$K(R)
m13 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0101 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->X(R)
m14 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR(K)
m15 00000 000 000 111    000    001    0000 0000 00 0111011101 c//MDR+0 >MAR(K)
m16 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m17 00000 000 000 011    000    000    0000 0000 00 0010011110 c//FEEDBACKREGISTER +0 -> Q
m18 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m19 00000 000 000 110    000    011    0000 0000 00 0010011101 c//MDR+Q->Bport,RAMF(R) 
m1a 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m1b 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m1c 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR SUB R,$K(R)
m1d 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0101 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->X(R)
m1e 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR(K)
m1f 00000 000 000 111    000    001    0000 0000 00 0111011101 c//MDR+0->MAR(K)
m20 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP
m21 00000 000 000 011    000    000    0000 0000 00 0010011110 c//FEEDBACKREGISTER +0 -> Q
m22 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP
m23 00000 000 000 110    001    011    0000 0000 00 0010011101 c//Q-MDR->Bport,RAMF(R) 
m24 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m25 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m26 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR ADD R1,R2(R1)
m27 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0101 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->X(R1)
m28 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR(R2)
m29 00000 000 000 111    000    001    0000 0000 00 0111011101 c//MDR+0->MAR(R2)
m2a 00000 000 000 011    000    000    0000 0000 00 0010011110 c//FEEDBACKREGISTER +0 -> Q
m2b 00000 000 000 010    000    011    0000 1010 00 0110011111 c//Q+0->Y(temp)
m2c 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m2d 00000 000 000 001    000    011    1010 0000 00 0010011110 c//Bport+Y->Bport(R1)
m2e 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m2f 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m30 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR SHLR(R)
m31 00000 000 000 111    000    001    0000 0000 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->NOP, SELB=1(R)
m32 00000 000 000 011    000    111    0000 0000 00 0010011111 c//SHLA SELB=0
m33 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m34 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m35 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR DECR(R)
m36 00000 000 000 111    000    011    0000 0101 00 0110011101 c//MDR+0->X(R)
m37 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m38 00000 000 000 011    000    000    0000 0000 00 0010011110 c//FEEDBACKREGISTER+0->Q
m39 00000 000 000 100    000    001    0101 0000 00 0110011110 c//X+0->NOP, SELB=1
m3a 00000 000 000 110    001    011    0000 0000 01 0010011110 c//Q-1->FEEDBACKREGISTER
m3b 00000 000 000 101    000    011    0001 0001 01 0111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m3c 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)

m3d 00000 000 000 000    000    001    0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC) entoli HALT

MAPPER 
m00 02 c//entoli LOAD R,$K
m01 0a c//entoli STORE R,$K
m02 12 c//entoli ADD R,$K
m03 1c c//entoli SUB R,$K
m04 26 c//entoli ADD R1,R2
m05 30 c//entoli SHLR 
m06 35 c//entoli DECR
m07 3d c// entoli HALT


R1=0010(2),R2=0011(3),X=0101(5),Y=1010(A)

MAIN 
m00 00 c//opcode entolis LOAD R,$K
m01 02 c//register R1 
m02 21 c//entelo X 
m03 02 c//opcode entolis ADD R,$K
m04 02 c//register R1
m05 22 c//entelo Y
m06 03 c//opcode entolis SUB R,$K
m07 02 c//register R1 
m08 23 c//entelo Z
m09 06 c//opcode DECR
m0a 02 c//register R1
m0b 05 c//opcode entolis SHLR
m0c 02 c//register R1
m0d 05 c//opcode entolis SHLR
m0e 02 c//register R1
m0f 00 c//opcode entolis LOAD R,$K
m10 03 c//register R2 
m11 21 c//entelo X
m12 02 c//opcode entolis ADD R,$K
m13 03 c//register R2 
m14 22 c//entelo Y
m15 06 c//opcode DECR
m16 03 c//register R2
m17 05 c//opcode entolis SHLR
m18 03 c//register R2
m19 04 c//opcode entolis ADD R1,R2
m1a 02 c// register R1
m1b 03 c// register R2
m1c 01 c// opcode entolis STORE R,$K
m1d 02 c// register R1
m1e 24 c// entelo W
m1f 07 c// opcode HALT
m20 00 c// perioxh data
m21 04 c// X
m22 02 c// Y
m23 03 c// Z
m24 00 c// W=18(decimal), 12(hex)
m25 00 
m26 00
